doc:
Simón Andreu https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sim%C3%B3n_Andreu 0 Simón Andreu Trobat (born 1 January 1941) is a Spanish actor. He has appeared in more than 180 films and television shows since 1961. In 2013 he was awarded with the Nosferatu Award at the Festival Internacional de Cinema Fantàstic de Catalunya for his long career. Simón_Andreu_Trobat ( born 1_January_1941 ) is a_Spanish_actor . He has_appeared in more_than_180_films_and_television_shows since 1961 . In 2013 he was_awarded with the_Nosferatu_Award at the_Festival_Internacional de Cinema_Fantàstic de Catalunya for his_long_career .
